summary.span: 显示图像并对图像上的鼠标单击作出响应的控件。

span.span: A control that displays an image and responds to mouse clicks on the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [确定用户单击的位置Determining Where the User Clicked](#DeterminingWhereTheUserClicked) - [ImageButton 控件和验证ImageButton Controls and Validation](#ButtonControlsAndValidation) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 "" 控件可显示响应鼠标单击的图像。Use the control to display an image that responds to mouse clicks. 当单击 控件时，将引发 和 事件。Both the and events are raised when the control is clicked. 您可以使用 事件处理程序使 控件的行为类似于命令按钮。You can use the event handler to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名称可以通过使用 属性与控件相关联。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 这允许将多个 控件放置在同一网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 然后，可以通过编程方式在 事件处理程序中标识 属性的值，以确定单击每个 控件时要执行的相应操作。The value of the property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 属性还可用于传递有关命令的附加信息，例如指定升序顺序。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. 使用 控件类似于使用 ASP.NET 控件。Using the control is similar to using the ASP.NET control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[按钮 Web 服务器控件内容映射](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf)。For more information, see [Button Web Server Controls Content Map](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/66b3ce28-3b93-4f0a-951f-42fb5bb5fddf). 和 控件的类概述。and the class overview for the control. ## 确定用户单击的位置Determining Where the User Clicked 通过使用 事件处理程序，你可以以编程方式确定单击图像的坐标。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 然后，可以根据坐标的值对响应进行编码。You can then code a response, based on the values of the coordinates. 请注意，原点（0，0）位于图像的左上角。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. ## ImageButton 控件和验证ImageButton Controls and Validation 默认情况下，单击 控件时，将执行页验证。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 若要防止页验证发生，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To prevent page validation from occurring, set the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140))和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 本主题提供了包含源代码的 Visual Studio 网站项目：[下载](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=192874). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个 控件，该控件显示单击图像时的坐标。The following code example demonstrates how to create an control that displays the coordinates at which an image is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，单击 控件时，将执行页验证。By default, page validation is performed when an control is clicked. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否全部通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control. 使用 属性单击 控件时，可以指定或确定是否在客户端和服务器上执行验证。You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an control is clicked by using the property. 若要防止执行验证，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To prevent validation from being performed, set the property to `false`. 此属性通常设置为 "重置" 或 "清除" 按钮的 `false`，以防止在单击按钮时执行验证。This property is commonly set to `false` for a Reset or Clear button to prevent validation from being performed when the button is clicked. 当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，还可以使用 属性来指定 控件对其进行验证的验证组的名称。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性阻止页验证发生。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to prevent page validation from occurring. 请注意， 方法独立激活每个验证控件。Notice how the method activates each validation control independently. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when an control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 事件通过控件层次结构以 `BubbleEvent`的形式引发。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. > [!NOTE] > 此事件会使页面回发到服务器。This event causes the page to post back to the server. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序，以确定单击了哪个 控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定单击 控件时要执行的命令，如 `Sort`、`Cancel`或 `Edit`。Use this property to specify the command to perform when the control is clicked, such as `Sort`, `Cancel`, or `Edit`. 这允许将多个 控件放置在同一网页上。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the same Web page. 然后，可以在 事件处理程序中以编程方式识别此属性中的值，以确定单击每个 控件时要执行的相应操作。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 有关命令的补充信息（如指定升序排序顺序）可以通过使用 属性来包括在内。Supplemental information about the command, such as specifying ascending sort order, can be included by using the property. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性将命令名称与 控件相关联。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to associate a command name with an control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定是否可以单击 来执行回发到服务器的。Use the property to specify whether an can be clicked to perform a post back to the server. 如果将此属性设置为 `false`，则控件将在页面上呈现，但在单击后不会引发回发事件。If you set this property to `false`, the control renders on the page, but does not raise a post back event when clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 此页包含两个 控件。The page contains two controls. 属性设置为 "`EnabledImageButton` 图像" 按钮的 `true`，这会使其在被单击时回发到服务器。The property is set to `true` for the `EnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to post back to the server when clicked. 属性设置为 "`NotEnabledImageButton` 图像" 按钮的 `false`，使其在页面上呈现，但在单击时不会回发到服务器。The property is set to `false` for the `NotEnabledImageButton` image button, causing it to render on the page, but not post back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 控件使用 `alt` 特性呈现 属性。By default, the control renders the property using an `alt` attribute. 如果未设置 属性，则 控件不包含 `alt` 特性来指定控件呈现中的替换文本。When the property is not set, the control does not include the `alt` attribute to specify the alternate-text in the control rendering. XHTML 文档类型定义需要图像控件上的 `alt` 属性。The XHTML document type definition requires the `alt` attribute on image controls. 不过，辅助功能最佳做法建议，不应指定与网页上下文相关的信息的图像控件不应指定 `alt` 特性。However, accessibility best practices recommend that image controls that do not convey information relevant to the context of the Web page should not specify an `alt` attribute. 可以通过将 属性设置为 `true`来满足 XHTML 和辅助功能要求。You can meet both XHTML and accessibility requirements by setting the property to `true`. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个表示 控件的回发行为的 对象。The method creates a object that represents the control's postback behavior. 然后 对象通常会传递到 方法，该方法用于获取对客户端脚本函数的引用，在调用该函数时，会导致服务器回发到页面。The object is then typically passed to the method, which is used to obtain a reference to a client-side script function that, when invoked, causes the server to postback to the page. 此方法主要由控件开发人员在扩展 类时使用。This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the class.

para.span: 可以在派生类中重写 方法，以修改按钮控件的回发选项，或在单击按钮时调用客户端脚本。

span.span: You can override the method in your derived class to modify the postback options for the button control, or to call client-side script when the button is clicked.

para.span: 请确保调用基类的 方法，以便设置标准回发选项。

span.span: Be sure to call the base class's method so that the standard postback options are set.

span.span: Raises the event and allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 通过使用 事件处理程序，你可以以编程方式确定单击图像的坐标。By using the event handler, you can programmatically determine the coordinates where the image is clicked. 然后，可以根据这些坐标的值对响应进行编码。You can then code a response, based on the values of these coordinates. 请注意，原点（0，0）位于图像的左上角。Note that the origin (0, 0) is located at the upper left corner of the image. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序，以显示用户在其中单击图像的坐标。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to display the coordinates where the user clicks the image. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic ImageButton.Click Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic ImageButton.Click Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击 控件时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the control is clicked. 事件处理程序用于使 控件的行为类似于命令按钮。The event handler is used to make the control behave like a Command button. 命令名称可以通过使用 属性与控件相关联。A command name can be associated with the control by using the property. 这允许在网页上放置多个 控件。This allows multiple controls to be placed on the Web page. 然后，可以在 事件处理程序中以编程方式识别此属性中的值，以确定单击每个 控件时要执行的相应操作。The value in this property can then be programmatically identified in the event handler to determine the appropriate action to perform when each control is clicked. 属性还可用于传递有关命令的附加信息，例如指定升序顺序。The property can also be used to pass additional information about the command, such as specifying ascending order. > [!NOTE] > 事件通过控件层次结构以 `BubbleEvent`的形式引发。The event is raised through the control hierarchy in the form of the `BubbleEvent`. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 事件指定和编写处理程序，以确定单击了哪个 控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to determine which control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，表示将页回发到自身。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which causes the page to post back to itself.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您使用 控件执行跨页面发布。The property allows you to perform a cross-page post using the control. 当单击 控件时，将 属性设置为要发布到的网页的 URL。Set the property to the URL of the Web page to post to when the control is clicked. 例如，指定 `Page2.aspx` 会导致包含 控件的页面发布到 `Page2.aspx`。For example, specifying `Page2.aspx` causes the page that contains the control to post to `Page2.aspx`. 如果没有为 属性指定值，则页面回发到自身。If you do not specify a value for the property, the page posts back to itself. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用带有服务器端验证的控件执行跨页面回发时，在处理回发之前，应检查是否 `true` 该页的 属性。When performing a cross-page postback with controls with server-side validation, you should check that the page's property is `true` before processing the postback. 对于跨页面回发，要检查的页面是 PreviousPage。In the case of a cross-page postback, the page to check is the PreviousPage. 以下 Visual Basic 代码演示了如何执行此操作：The following Visual Basic code shows how this is done: ``` Sub Page_Load(ByVal sender As Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Me.Load If Page.PreviousPage.IsValid Then ' Handle the post back Else Response.Write("Invalid") End If End Sub ``` 有关跨页面发布技术的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms 中的跨页面发布](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information on cross-page posting techniques, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来执行跨页面的 post。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to perform a cross-page post. 当用户单击 控件时，此页将在文本框中输入的值发送到 属性指定的目标页。When the user clicks the control, the page posts the value entered in the text box to the target page specified by the property. 若要运行此示例，还必须在与此代码示例相同的目录中为目标页创建一个文件。To run this sample, you must also create a file for the target page in the same directory as this code example. 下一个示例中提供了目标页的代码。The code for the target page is provided in the next example. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlProperty/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpropertyvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问使用 属性从另一页发送的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access a value that was posted from another page using the property. 此页获取从上一页发送的字符串，并将其显示给用户。This page gets the string that was posted from the previous page and displays it to the user. 如果尝试直接运行此代码示例，将会出现错误，因为 "`Text`" 字段的值将 `null`。If you attempt to run this code example directly, you will get an error because the value of the `Text` field will be `null`. 相反，请使用此代码创建一个目标页，并将该文件放在与上一个示例的代码相同的目录中。Instead, use this code to create a target page and place the file in the same directory as the code for the previous example. 该文件的名称必须与上一示例中为 属性指定的值相对应。The name of the file must correspond to the value specified for the property in the previous example. 运行上一示例中的代码时，此页将在发生跨页面发送时自动执行。When you run the code for the previous example, this page will execute automatically when the cross-page post occurs. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2/CS/imagebutton.postbackurlpage2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.PostBackUrlPage2/VB/imagebutton.postbackurlpage2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果 `true`此属性，则在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现 `disabled` 属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果 `false`此属性，则在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现 `class` 属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性主要由控件开发人员在从 控件派生自定义类时使用。The property is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 使用 属性可确定与 控件关联的 值。Use the property to determine the value associated with an control. 此属性将重写基实现以始终返回 `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`。This property overrides the base implementation to always return `HtmlTextWriterTag.Input`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义 控件中的 方法，以便它始终返回输入标记。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control so that it always returns an Input tag. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将代码示例的第一部分复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。The first part of the code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 第二部分必须位于 .cs 文件（对于C#）或 .vb 文件（对于 Visual Basic）中。The second part must be in a .cs file (for C#) or a .vb file (for Visual Basic). 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomImageButtonTagKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/CS/custom_imagebutton_tagkeycs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomImageButtonTagKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/VB/custom_imagebutton_tagkeyvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomImageButtonTagKey#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/CS/custom_imagebutton_tagkey.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomImageButtonTagKey#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomImageButtonTagKey/VB/custom_imagebutton_tagkey.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件回发到服务器时所导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，此属性才有效。This property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定此属性的值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for this property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性指定 控件回发到服务器时要验证的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the controls to validate when an control posts back to the server. 此页包含三个文本框，用于捕获用户的数据和三个 控件，以确保用户不会将文本框留空。The page contains three text boxes to capture data from the user and three controls to ensure that the user does not leave a text box blank. 前两个文本框的 控件位于 `PersonalInfoGroup` 验证组中，第三个文本框的 控件位于 `LocationInfoGroup` 验证组中。The controls for the first two text boxes are in the `PersonalInfoGroup` validation group and the control for the third text box is in the `LocationInfoGroup` validation group. 单击 `ImageButton1` 时，只会验证验证组 `PersonalInfoGroup` 中的控件。When `ImageButton1` is clicked, only the controls in validation group `PersonalInfoGroup` are validated. 单击 `ImageButton2` 后，只验证验证组 `LocationInfoGroup` 中的控件。When `ImageButton2` is clicked, only the control in validation group `LocationInfoGroup` is validated. [!code-aspx-csharp[ImageButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.ValidationGroup/CS/imagebutton.validationgroupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ImageButton.ValidationGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ImageButton.ValidationGroup/VB/imagebutton.validationgroupvb.aspx#1)]
